short_summary: Building maintenance and repair by company X or Y of building of client X of Secteur Z
description: This is a request for standing order (RSO) for building maintenance and repair services. The services will be performed by either company X or Y. The maintenance work will be conducted in several sites of client X.  The RSO is for a term of three years, with an option to renew for two additional years. The term will commence on May 1, 2023, and shall continue until April 30, 2025. The RSO will be administered by the Public Works and Government Services Canada, working with the Procurement and Asset Management Branch. This RSO will govern the terms and conditions applicable to the supply or service of building maintenance and repair services.
